title: Our Group
desc: SAMACO Toys and Leisure is part of Al Nahla Group, the Saudi family group since the 1930s. Al Nahla Group is headed executively by Mr. Mohamed Wajih Hassan Sharbatly, while SAMACO Toys and Leisure reports to the trade sector in the Group under the supervision and management of the CEO and General Manager, Mr. Sultan Khaled al-Turki.
